reviewText: As you might imagine from the title "Scream Queen Hot Tub Party," this DVD is intended mainly for ogling at great-looking and sexy ladies. And they're ALL a big wow - Michelle Bauer, Brinke Stevens, Kelli Maroney, Monique Gabrielle, and Roxanne Kernohan (and 2 others in the second film). At a hot tub party they're reminiscing about horror films they've been in, so there's many clips from those. I'm not big on gory horror films like these, but they're largely over-the-top fun, and the clips focus on T & A of the gorgeous ladies, thank goodness. The "double feature" refers to the non-violent bonus film "One Million Heels B.C.," which is also inane but again, who cares with the gorgeous and usually nude ladies in it? Those ladies are Michelle Bauer, Jerica Fox, and Cierra Knight. Camera-work is rather crude on this one, but generally adequate. And this film has got a VERY hot scene of the ladies bathing each other. However, even with two films on this DVD, the total run time is 102 minutes. And for some reason, the picture quality on the hot tub film is rather poor and fuzzy. I'd really like to give this DVD 4 stars for the incredibly sexy ladies in it, but the fuzzy image of the hot tub film, and the crude camera-work of the second film, caused me to knock it down to 3. I should note too that aficionados of nice breasts will be very pleased with this DVD! MMMMMMM......I'm going to have to look for these hot babes in some other movies......
Title: N/A

reviewText: Scream Queen Hot Tub Party is utter nonsense about a bunch of hot babes who strip down and relax in a hot tub at the mansion of "Byron Orlock",telling each other stories about there careers and than doing sexy things.Ridiculous in the extreme,but this does deliver the goods with Brinke Stevens teaching us how to take a hot shower,Monique Gabrielle taking her clothes off to do the "vampire dance" and Michelle Bauer does the chainsaw dancw from "Hollywood Chainsaw Hookers"(1986),stripping her clothes off course.There is also many scenes from there films(and other babe's films) showcasing all the "best" moments,those of course being the parts with T and A.Not surprisingly,this was helmed by B-movie favorites,Jim Wynorski and Fred Olen Ray,and they certainly know what there fans want!The quality is mixed(it looks like video)but the girls are all sexy and are cult figures,so there's alot of entertainment value here for the male viewer.There's also a bonus feature about a sexy cave woman(played by Michelle Bauer) called "One Million Heels B.C",and it's mildly enjoyable,even if the quality is even worse than the feature.Skin fans and Trash cinema devotees should give this one a shot.
summary: If this title attracts your attention,than read on....
Title: N/A

reviewText: The title just about say it all. If you are a big Brink Stevens and Michelle Bauer fan and you want to see them in a hot tub with three other lovely scream queens, this is your movie. It seems that this count, which none of them ever met before invites the ladies to his mansion where they make themselves at home and get into the hot tub. They share all of their experiences with each other which include excerpts from some of the horror movies they were in. Great moments feature the Brink Stevens documentary segment "How to take a scream queen shower" and Michelle Bauer discussing her favorite motorized toy - the chainsaw. Here we get to see a couple scenes from "Hollywood Chainsaw Hookers",which are actually the best parts of that movie. If you get this DVD, save your money and don't bother with that one. The bonus feature "One Million Heels B.C." is included as well. This one stars Michelle Bauer in her "unforgettable" role as a prehistoric cave girl who was buried underground for millions of years and is still alive. She digs herself out of the ground, then befriends two other gorgeous gals who dream of going to Hollywood some day. She speaks perfect English, too. They learn fast don't they? The plots are so campy and moronic they're actually funny, but then who cares. We get to see seven lovely ladies wearing very little or nothing which more than makes up for the lack of anything else.
summary: Don't expect an award winning plot with this one
